alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mendocino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 28 at 8:52AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central California and northwest California, including the following counties, in central California, Lake. In northwest California, Mendocino. * WHEN...Until 200 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 852 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lakeport, Upper Lake, Middletown, Clearlake, Glenhaven, Konocti Bay, Mount Konocti, Soda Bay, Seigler Springs, Loch Lomond, Finley, Adams, Ettawa Springs, Hobergs, Hough Springs, North Lakeport, Forest Lake, Whispering Pines, Barkerville and Anderson Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
